caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (identified as national security risks by US Intelligence) from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. This affects Chinese citizens and entities if China is listed in the three most recent Annual Threat Assessments. Exceptions include US citizens, permanent residents, and residential homestead properties. The attorney general can enforce divestiture through court action.

中文总结：
该法案禁止来自被指定国家（被美国情报机构认定为国家安全风险的国家）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买或获得房地产。如果中国在最近三次年度威胁评估中被列入，这将影响中国公民和实体。例外情况包括美国公民、永久居民和自住房产。司法部长可以通过法院强制执行资产剥离。
